answers.answer: I'm glad your Dr took the time to answer your questions, it must be a bit scary. I hope you keep it under control and have a healthy 70days!

Well thats great that you feel better about it.  At least you dont have to check your levels like 8 times a day or something of that nature.  ***** with your diet though.  I figured it wouldnt be that big of a change shows how much i know.My arms looked like a drug addicts after the 3 hour test, i was embarrassed to wear short sleeve shirts!  haha  Keep up the good feelings and just dont forget to smile!

question: So I just got home from the endocrinologist.  She confirmed my gest. diabetes and took time to answer so many questions!Well, I need to check my sugar levels twice a day, big dramatic change on my diet, and I  need to walk 15-20 minutes every day.She needs to do some more testing, so I will need to go to the lab again!  God, my arms are gonna look like a drug addict's! I wil then need to go back on monday with the results.So the thing is that I feel better now, maybe because she was so nice...Just wanted to let everyone know, thanks everyone for your supportive words!
title: Went to the endocrinologist (feeling a little better)
